content: Perpustakaan digital ini sudah cukup baik, berjalan dengan lancar dan bagus Ada beberapa yang menurut saya harus di tingkatkan: 1. Notifikasi tidak muncul ketika buku antrian sudah ada. 2. Buat pembatas atau pengingat halaman di setiap buku, karena saya sering lupa,saya baca buku sampai halaman berapa?. 3. Tampilan yang lebih segar lagi dan lebih simpel tapi berisi. 4. Ketika meminjam buku tolong di beri waktu, berapa lama lagi buku akan di kembalikan. 5. Buat notifikasi ajakan membaca/ motivasi
English: This digital library is quite good, runs smoothly and is good. There are a few things that I think should be improved: 1. Notifications don't appear when the queue book is already there. 2. Make page boundaries or reminders for each book, because I often forget, how many pages did I read in a book?. 3. The appearance is fresher and more simple but contains. 4. When borrowing a book, please give time, how much longer will the book be returned. 5. Create an invitation to read/motivation notification

content: Tambahkan fitur melihat daftar isi buku agar mudah memilih buku untuk dipinjam. Kebijakan "pinjam dulu baru bisa mengetahui isi buku" membuat kita kesulitan memilih, sehingga sering salah pilih buku. Baru tahu setelah buku dipinjam. Padahal kebijakan "24 jam baru bisa dikembalikan" membuat tidak bisa segera dikembalikan (yang salah pilih tadi). Keberadaan sinopsis tidak banyak membantu, karena tergantung penulis sinopsis. Lebih asyik lihat daftar isi dan baca sekilas.
English: Add a feature to view the book's table of contents to make it easy to choose books to borrow. The policy of "borrow first then find out the contents of the book" makes it difficult for us to choose, so we often choose the wrong book. Only found out after the book was borrowed. Even though the policy of "24 hours can only be returned" means that it cannot be returned immediately (which was the wrong choice earlier). The existence of a synopsis is not much help, because it depends on the author of the synopsis. It's more fun to look at the table of contents and skim.

content: Sebetulnya saya sangat terbantu karena aplikasi ini. Membaca jadi lebih mudah. Akan tetapi, akhir-akhir ini saat mau buka aplikasi/cari judul buku/buka rak buku/lain-lain loading nya sangat lama. Padahal internet saya normal. Mohon segera diperbaiki.
English: Actually I was very helped because of this application. Reading is so much easier. However, lately when I want to open an application / search for a book title / open a bookshelf / etc. it takes a very long time to load. Even though my internet is normal. Please fix soon.

content: Aplikasi ini memang pantas diberi bintang 5. Koleksi bukunya bertahap sudah lebih baik. Namun saran saya sebagai pembaca iPusnas: (1) Biasanya loding aplikasi sangat lama waktu dibuka awal-awal membuka aplikasi. Padahal jaringan saya bagus. (2) Alangkah baiknya kita diberikan urutan mengantri, agar tidak berebut ebook dengan yang lain. (3) Alangkah lebih baik notifikasi -buku yang sudah tersedia- muncul di atas bar notifikasi.
English: This application deserves 5 stars. The book collection is gradually getting better. However, my suggestions as an iPusnas reader: (1) Usually loading applications takes a long time to open the first time the application is opened. Even though my network is good. (2) It would be nice if we were given the order of queuing, so as not to fight over the ebook with others. (3) It would be nice if notifications -books that were already available- appeared above the notification bar.

content: Saya merasa sangat terbantu dengan adanya aplikasi ini, banyak buku yang bisa saya jadikan sumber untuk mengerjakan berbagai macam tugas perkuliahan, terutama laporan praktikum. Saran dari saya mohon tambahkan fitur pencarian kata kunci pada buku yang sedang kita baca/buka supaya lebih mudah dan mempercepat proses pencarian materi yang sedang kita butuhkan. Selain itu, saya izin memberikan saran kuota meminjam buku untuk perhari nya lebih dari 5, supaya kita sebagai pembaca lebih leluasa.
English: I feel very helpful with this application, there are many books that I can use as sources for doing various lecture assignments, especially practicum reports. My advice, please add a keyword search feature to the book we are reading/opening to make it easier and speed up the process of finding the material we need. In addition, I give permission to suggest a quota for borrowing books for more than 5 per day, so that we as readers are more flexible.

content: iPusnas memang bagus namun ada beberapa kekurangan yang aku kurang sukai. Contohnya sebelum meminjam tidak bisa melihat isi buku(tidak seperti Smart Library walaupun hanya beberapa halaman) jadi terpaksa meminjam untuk mengetahui isi buku dan terkadang buku yang dipinjam tidak sesuai harapan. Selain itu juga tidak bisa mengetahui berapa banyak halaman di buku yang akan dipinjam. Tambahkan juga 'baca nanti' atau semacamnya supaya bisa menyimpan buku yang akan dibaca tapi belum sempat meminjam.
English: iPusnas is indeed good but there are some drawbacks that I don't like. For example, before borrowing, you can't see the contents of the book (unlike the Smart Library even though it's only a few pages) so you have to borrow to find out the contents of the book and sometimes the borrowed book doesn't match your expectations. In addition, they also cannot know how many pages in the book will be borrowed. Also add 'read later' or something like that so you can save books you want to read but haven't had time to borrow.

content: Secara keseluruhan (fitur, layanan, cara meminjam, dll) sudah baik dan cukup memudahkan serta menarik juga. Namun sayangnya beberapa buku referensi ilmu pengetahuan belum tersedia di sini. English: Overall (features, services, how to borrow, etc.) are good and quite easy and interesting too. But unfortunately some science reference books are not yet available here. My advice, add a collection of knowledge books. Both books by Indonesian writers/researchers and books by foreign authors, so that Indonesian students' references are more diverse. When there are many references, the knowledge generated will be more optimal in the midst of the uncertainty of the pandemic. Ipusnas spirit!

content: Saya suka sekali aplikasi ini. Untuk saran, saya harap ada tambahan fitur lagi setelah peminjaman buku, riwayat, dan antrian di rak. Fitur tersebut bisa digunakan untuk menyimpan atau mengumpulkan judul buku yang hendak kita baca, namun bukan meminjam (wishlist). Karena terkadang kami menemukan buku baru, namun buku yang pernah kami pinjam belum selesai dibaca. content: Sedikit masukan utk pihak ipusnas, Perbaiki sistem antrian supaya jelas dptnya kpn, beri keuntungan pda level pengguna, klo gaada keuntungan utk apa ada level newbie hingga bookworm? Keuntungan bookworm misalnya utk meminjam buku yg antri jika sudah level bookworm tdk perlu antri. Atau apapun lah. Yang jelas utk buku yg antriannya banyak beri kejelasan dpt antriannya kapan biar ga main rebutan sedang notif ga selalu muncul di HP. Gitu aja sih semoga dibaca dan dipikirkan lebih serius.
English: A little input for ipusnas, fix the queuing system so it's clear when you get it, give benefits to the user level, if there is no profit for what is there a newbie level to bookworm? The advantage of bookworm, for example, is to borrow books that are in line, if you are at the bookworm level, you don't need to queue. Or whatever. What is clear is that for books with a lot of queues, it is clear when you can get the queue so you don't play games, while notifications don't always appear on your cellphone. That's it, I hope you read it and think about it more seriously.

content: Ayo membaca di iPusnas! Pengalaman membaca disini bagus banget. Ada vitur bookmark untuk penanda bacaan selesai dimana. Ini keren. User interface-nya ditingkatkan lagi. Tapi ini sangat membantu untuk bisa membaca di mana saja. Banyak buku bagus kok. Cari aja di kategori yang belum pernah kamu baca. Serius keren-keren.
English: Let's read on iPusnas! The reading experience here is great. There is a bookmark feature to mark where the reading is finished. This cool. The user interface has been improved again. Please, for famous books, one more copy can be added. On my cellphone there is a dark screen problem. The e-library category can be added with famous figures, it will be more down to earth. But it really helps to be able to read anywhere. There are lots of good books. Just look in the categories you've never read. Seriously cool.

But unfortunately the stock of books is low so the queues can be long and long, and the collection is still incomplete in my opinion. And if you can add a wishlist feature. Hopefully it can be even better!

Bug ini terjadi ketika saya sedang membaca, lalu smartphone saya biarkan sleep dan ketika ingin dinyalakan, dengan sendirinya keluar ke halaman utama Ipusnas. Versi OS Android yang saya gunakan yaitu 8.1.0. Semoga kedepannya tim developer bisa memperbaiki bug ini. Thanks :)
English: The app is great, but I found a bug while reading a book. The bug is that it exits to the Ipusnas main page by itself even though I didn't press any buttons (only scrolling the book). This bug occurs when I'm reading, then I let my smartphone sleep and when I want to turn it on, it automatically exits to the Ipusnas main page. The Android OS version that I use is 8.1.0. Hopefully in the future the development team can fix this bug. Thanks :)

The book queuing system uses a standard level system. Thanks. :)

content: Installer aplikasi iPusnas versi PC mengandung virus trojan yang terdeteksi menggunakan antivirus Kaspersky. Detail virusnya adalah sbb: "Object name HEUR: Trojan-PSW.Win32.Xploder.gen Object type Trojan program" Menurut penjelasan dari Kaspersky, virus Trojan jenis Trojan-PSW (Password stealing ware) merupakan virus yg didesain untuk mencuri informasi akun pengguna seperti login dan password. Mohon penjelasannya..mengapa aplikasi resmi pemerintah menyusupkan virus peretas info pengguna?
English: The PC version of the iPusnas application installer contains a trojan virus which was detected using Kaspersky antivirus. The details of the virus are as follows: "Object name HEUR: Trojan-PSW.Win32.Xploder.gen Object type Trojan program" According to Kaspersky's explanation, the Trojan-PSW (Password stealing ware) type of Trojan virus is a virus designed to steal user account information such as logins and passwords. Please explain..why do official government apps infiltrate user info hacker virus?

content: Izin memberi saran untuk iPusnas : 1. Riwayat bacaan pengguna dapat disortir oleh pengguna. Supaya riwayat bacaan pada akun pengguna dapat menjadi tempat rekomendasi buku. Menambahkan jumlah buku-buku yang waiting listnya sangat banyak sehingga pengguna tidak lama menuggu antrian. Terima kasih, sukses selalu‚ô°
English: Permission to give suggestions for iPusnas : 1. User reading history can be sorted by user. So that the reading history on the user account can be a place for book recommendations. For example, there is a book that the user does not recommend can be deleted from the history. 2. There is a wishlist, so users are no longer confused about finding the book they want to read. 3. Adding the number of books that have a very large waiting list so that users don't have to wait long in queues. Thank you, success always

content: Perlu diperhatikan bahwa aplikasi ini memiliki banyak bug. Berikut yang saya dapatkan: 1) Aplikasi sering logout akun sendiri; 2) setelah buku dipinjam ke 4 kalinya, buku tidak dapat di downlod. Saya mengakali dengan coba instal ipusnas di pc dan sama saja; 3) notifikasi antrian buku apabila sudah tersedia sering diulang-ulang. Bahkan sekali pernah untuk notifikasi ketersediaan 1 buku, saya mendapatkan 4 pengulangan notifikasi (iya ini menganggu). Itu 3 bug paling menggangu. App di pc sama aja.
English: Please note that this application has many bugs. Here's what I get: 1) The application often logs out of its own account; 2) after the book is borrowed for the 4th time, the book cannot be downloaded. I circumvented by trying to install ipusnas on my pc and it's the same; 3) notification of the book queue when it is available is often repeated. Even once for notification of the availability of 1 book, I got 4 repeated notifications (yes this is annoying). Those are the 3 most annoying bugs. Apps on PC are the same.

content: Ide aplikasi ini sangat brilian. Waktu Perpustakaan Nasional diresmikan di Jakarta dgn gedung megahnya, sebagai orang daerah saya sempat iri. Dan ternyata muncul aplikasi yg membuat oang2 daerah bisa meminjam buku2 di pusnas. Koleksi bukunya juga di luar dugaan, cukup lengkap. Tapiiiii....aplikasi nya masih jauh dari bagus. Loadingnya lambat, sering ter-logout sendiri. Bookmark suka hilang sendiri. Semoga bisa diperbaiki lagi ke depan.
English: The idea of ‚Äã‚Äãthis app is brilliant. When the National Library was inaugurated in Jakarta with its magnificent building, as a local, I was envious. And it turns out that an application has appeared that allows local people to borrow books at the National Center. The collection of books is also beyond expectations, quite complete. Butiiiiii .... the application is still far from good. Loading is slow, it often logs out itself. Bookmarks like to disappear on their own. Hopefully it can be fixed again in the future.

Jika ini slah satu fasilitas negara utk rakyat, tentu alokasi anggarannya tidak sdikit. Terimakasih
English: Sorry had to uninstall. Sorry in advance.. In my opinion, the appearance of the app. this seems boring, monotonous, starting from the color game, font, or dashboard arrangement. Network timeouts happen very often, when downloading books, searching for books, etc., even when used for other apps, it runs smoothly. Still needs a lot of improvement. content: Halo! Terima kasih sudah menyediakan aplikasi untuk membaca buku secara gratis. Saya sangat terbantu dengan aplikasi ini. English: Hello! Thank you for providing an application to read books for free. I am very helpful with this application. But I find it a little difficult because there are no features such as 'wishlist or want to read' even though the number of loan books is limited every day. Sometimes when I find a book that I think is interesting and I want to read, I forget it because there is no such feature, only sharing and recommendations. Please improve again. Thank you :)

The social features can be improved again, as long as there are no likes and photo status features, maybe the direction can still be controlled as expected. There is no add to queue option yet. Maybe you can think about a subscription feature for a longer loan duration, but keep the free one so that everyone can reach it.

content: Jumlah buku sudah banyak, tetapi masih banyak buku baru yang belum masuk. Yang paling patut diperbaiki adalah tampilan halaman-halaman buku yang menurut saya masih jauh untuk dikatakan "nyaman" untuk dibaca. Tulisannya yang kecil, halaman yang hanya ada warna putih, beberapa buku nggak bisa dibookmark. Mungkin bisa diperbaiki supaya pembaca nyaman membaca di iPusnas, bisa mencontoh Kindley. Dan, jika nyaman membaca iPusnas bisa menjadi penggerak untuk mencegah pembajakan buku.
English: The number of books is already a lot, but there are still many new books that have not been entered. The most worthy of improvement is the appearance of the pages of the book which in my opinion is still far from being "comfortable" to read. The writing is small, the pages are only white, some books can't be bookmarked. Maybe it can be improved so that readers are comfortable reading on iPusnas, they can imitate the Kindley. And, if you are comfortable reading, iPusnas can be a driving force to prevent book piracy.

content: Aplikasinya bagus, sangat membantu, akan tetapi perlu bebebapa perbaikan dan pengembangan lagi, terrutama: 1. mengenai pinjam meminjam dan pengembalian, 2. English: The application is good, very helpful, but it needs some improvements and developments, especially: 1. regarding borrowing and returning, 2. If possible, next to the cover image of the book, the table of contents of the book should be affixed so as not to borrow wrongly, 3. Add a page search feature so as not to scroll manually, 4. Verification that sometimes doesn't come in, 5. collection of books, I hope this criticism and suggestion can help, thank you

content: Edit review sedikit. Beberapa hari ini Ipusnas udah nggak eror2 lagi. Jadi, aku seneng. Semoga aplikasinya semakin berkembang dan maju. Oiya, mungkin perlu ada sosialisasi biar banyak orang yang tahu tentang aplikasi ini. Terlebih yang domsnya di wilayah pelosok seperti saya, yang susah mendapat pasokan buku karena harganya terbilang mahalv: biar banyak yang pakai dan budaya literasi semakin tertanam sejak dini. Juga supaya meminimalisir maraknya buku dan ebook bajakan.Bravo for IpusnasTeam<3
English: Edit the review a bit. In the past few days, Ipusnas has no more errors. So, I'm happy. Hopefully the application will continue to grow and progress. Oh yeah, maybe there needs to be socialization so that many people know about this application. Especially those whose doms are in remote areas like me, where it is difficult to get a supply of books because they are quite expensivev: so that many people use them and the culture of literacy is embedded from an early age. Also to minimize the prevalence of pirated books and ebooks. Bravo for IpusnasTeam<3

content: Apikasi iPusnas bertambah bagus dari sejak saya meng-uninstall apikasi ini pada tahun pertama saya kuliah. Terimakasih sudah membuat aplikasi ini tambah bagus, saya merasa sangat terbantu dengan koleksi buku keilmuwan dan terhibur dengan buku fiksinya. Tapi menurut saya aplikasi ini masih butuh dirapihkan lagi. Ada baiknya buku digolongkan/dilengkapi fitur pencarian berdasarkan jenis buku supaya pengguna lebih mudah untuk mencari bahan bacaan dengan jenis tertentu secara random. Salam literasi
English: The iPusnas application has gotten better since I uninstalled this application in my first year of college. Thank you for making this application even better, I feel very helped by the collection of scientific books and entertained by the fiction books. But in my opinion this application still needs to be tidied up again. It is better for books to be classified/equipped with a search feature based on the type of book so that it is easier for users to find reading materials of certain types at random. Greetings literacy

content: Saya tetap akan memberi bintang 5 pada aplikasi Ipusnas. Saya dan kawan-kawan dari relawan literasi semakin dimudahkan dengan aplikasi ini karena membaca tidak lagi harus melalui buku fisik. Hal ini mengingat kendala finansial dan aksesabilitas masyarakat terhadap bahan bacaan. Lewat aplikasi ini, kami bisa membelokkan orientasi penggunaan smartphone untuk mengakses bahan bacaan gratis berbasis aplikasi. Akan lebih baik Ipusnas berkolaborasi dengan pegiat agar distribusi ini terus meluas.
English: I will still give 5 stars to the Ipusnas application. My friends and I from literacy volunteers have made it easier with this application because reading no longer has to go through physical books. This is in view of financial constraints and public accessibility to reading materials. Through this application, we can change the orientation of using smartphones to access application-based free reading materials. It would be better if Ipusnas collaborated with activists so that this distribution would continue to expand.

content: Saya senang dengan Ipusnas, bukunya lumayan lengkap khususnya untuk yang terbitan penerbit gramedia grup dan mizan grup. Tapi sayang sekali kenapa membaca ebook dari penerbit mizan grup, mode bacanya berbeda dengan gramedia grup ya? Tolong dong diubah biar mode bacanya sama dengan gramedia grup, yang biar bisa melihat sampai halaman berapa kita membaca. Terus biar mode bacanya menggulir layar ponsel ke atas bukannya ke samping, soalnya itu kurang enak. Terima kasih.
English: I am happy with Ipusnas, the books are quite complete, especially for those published by the Gramedia Group and Mizan Group publishers. But it's a shame why read ebooks from the Mizan group publisher, the reading mode is different from the Gramedia group, right? Please change it so that the reading mode is the same as the Gramedia group, so that we can see how many pages we read. Continue to let the reading mode scroll the phone screen up instead of sideways, because it's not comfortable. Thank you

content: Bersyukur banget kenal ipusnas setelah ikut sosialisasi yang diselenggarakan oleh Perpusnas. Awalnya cuma sekedar download dan nggak nyoba pinjem. Tapi berhubung ada mahasiswa yang curhat kalau ada tugas dan butuh referensi buku malam itu juga. Aku jd inget ipusnas. Alhasil aku login ipusnas dan nyoba pinjem buku online. Alhamdulillah buku-bukunya banyak dan beragam. Dan beberapa bisa dijadikan referensi mahasiswa buat ngerjain tugas. Selain itu ukuran file buku juga kecil. Jadi proses download pun cepet. Karna mungkin belum terlalu ngehits jadi antrian pinjem bukupun nggak lama. Malam itu aku bisa pinjem 3 buku. Dan puas banget. Baca elektronik buku lewat hp ternyata ga ngebosenin. Soalnya tampilannya sama dengan buku aslinya. Pas aku pinjem buku tentang fashion gambar dan warnanya juga jelas banget. Pokoknya aplikasi ipusnas recomended banget buat kalian di segala usia. Soalnya kategori bukunya banyak. Buku anak-anak seperti KKPK juga ada. Dan pustakawan juga terbantu dengan adanya aplikasi ini. Selain untuk menggerakkan minat baca. Juga untuk menambah wawasan mengenai sumber bacaan online. Terima kasih perpusnas yang telah meluncurkan ipusnas. Semoga koleksi ipusnas makin beragam dan bisa lebih terkenal dan diminati masyarakat.
English: Very grateful to know Ipusnas after participating in the socialization organized by the National Library of Indonesia. At first it was just a download and didn't try to borrow it. But since there are students who vent if they have assignments and need book references that night. I remember ipusnas. As a result, I logged into Ipusnas and tried to borrow books online. Thank God the books are many and varied. And some can be used as references for students to do assignments. In addition, the file size of the book is also small. So the download process is fast. Because maybe it's not too popular, so the queue for borrowing books isn't long. That night I was able to borrow 3 books. And very satisfied. Reading electronic books on a cellphone is not boring. Because it looks the same as the original book. When I borrowed a book about fashion, the pictures and colors were also very clear. Anyway, the ipusnas application is really recommended for all ages. Because there are many categories of books. There are also children's books such as KKPK. And librarians are also helped by this application. In addition to driving interest in reading. Also to add insight about online reading sources. Thank you National Library for launching Ipusnas. Hopefully, the Ipusnas collection will be more diverse and can be more famous and in demand by the public.

content: Udah sangat keren kok iPusnas iniüëç tapi saran saya kalau bisa ditambah lagi dengan opsi 'yang akan dibaca' tiap preview bukunya. Karena kadang kan readers ketemu buku bagus secara random, nah tapi karena udah max pinjem buku di hari itu akhirnya si buku gak bisa ditandai/disimpen dulu gitu untuk besok2nya dipinjam dan dibaca. Kalau nantinya ada opsi ini akan sangat memudahkan menandai buku mana yang besok2 mau dipinjam, gak lagi harus mencatat terlebih dulu judulnya apa penulisnya siapa.
English: How cool is this iPusnas üëç but my suggestion if you can add more options 'to read' every preview of the book. Because sometimes readers find good books randomly, but because I borrowed the book max that day, the book couldn't be marked/saved so that it could be borrowed and read the next day. If there is an option later, it will make it much easier to mark which book you want to borrow tomorrow, no longer having to write down the title and the author.

content: Kebijakan batas peminjaman buku menjadi maksimal 3 judul per hari itu adalah terlalu menyusahkan, bisakah diprogram lebih baik lagi? . Dimana untuk membaca harus meminjam. Kalau ternyata setelah dipinjam isinya tidak seperti yang diharapkan maka akan dikembalikan. Jadi, kalau pengguna/user telah mengembalikan ebook pinjaman itu lagi, sebaiknya diberi hak untuk meminjam judul yang lain hingga maksimal 3 judul, dan kalau pinjaman kedua juga masih tidak sesuai harapan, pengguna bisa meminjam tiga judul dalam pinjaman ketiga setelah semua pinjaman kedua dikembalikan. Mohon diperhatikan, karena pembatasan peminjaman 3 judul perhari tanpa memperhatikan hal ini adalah hanya akan menyusahkan pengguna yang berminat membaca ebook yang disediakan ipusnas untuk dibaca. Lagian, ipusnaskan isinya buku digital, bukan buku cetak. Terimakasih.
English: The policy of limiting book lending to a maximum of 3 titles per day is too troublesome, can it be programmed better? . Where to read have to borrow. If it turns out that after borrowing the contents are not as expected, they will be returned. So, if the user has returned the borrowed ebook again, he should be given the right to borrow another title up to a maximum of 3 titles, and if the second loan is still not as expected, the user can borrow three titles in the third loan after all the second loans are returned. Please note, because the limitation of borrowing 3 titles per day without paying attention to this will only make it difficult for users who are interested in reading the ebook provided by ipusnas to read. After all, Ipusnas contains digital books, not printed books. Thank you.

It's just that there are some problems that could be fixed in the next version, including (1) there is no button or email registration menu for new users, so you have to try logging in and the registration form will appear, if there is a button to REGISTER for new users, it feels more comfortable , and (2) search by author with no results. Thank you for your feedback and help

Padahal saya sangat suka aplikasi ini, sangat bermanfaat,  yaa seperi fungsi perpustakaan pada umumnya, dan dapat diakses di mana saja. Jikalau ada pembaruan sistem atau lain-lain yang mungkin bisa mengganggu akses ya diinformasikan pada pengguna. Agar kami bisa wanti-wanti atau bagaimana.   Sekian masukkan saya, semoga aplikasi i pusnas dapat meningkatkan kinerjanya dengan lebih maksimal dan menambah buku-buku, ehem khususnya sastra dan bahasa, (saya jarang menemukan hehe).
English: Sometimes it's often not connected, even though the signal is good . Sometimes books that have been borrowed and have not yet been returned cannot be opened offline. Even though I really like this application, it is very useful, like a library function in general, and can be accessed anywhere. If there is a system update or something else that might interfere with access, it will be informed to the user. So that we can be warned or something. That's all for my input, I hope that the National Library of Indonesia application can improve its performance more optimally and add books, especially literature and language, (I rarely find it hehe).

content: Koleksinya belum memuaskan, tapi cukuplah buat nambah bacaan. Kenapa sekarang harus registrasi ulang? PS: Jose Saramago itu salah satu penulis penting, dan Blindness juga salah satu novelnya yang penting. Sejauh yang saya tahu itu satu-satunya novel beliau yang sudah diterjemahkan ke bahasa Indonesia. Semoga mesin pencari, dan aplikasinya secara keseluruhan, segera diperbaiki.
English: The collection is not satisfactory, but enough to add to the reading. Why now have to re-register? I'm reading Jose Saramago's novel, it's almost finished, and unfortunately it can't be found in search engines, so I've been relying on the History feature to re-download it, and of course it's only in my old account. PS: Jose Saramago is one of the important writers, and Blindness is also one of his important novels. As far as I know it is the only novel of his that has been translated into Indonesian. Hopefully the search engine, and the app as a whole, gets fixed soon.

content: Banyak wishlist bukuku yg ada di sini. Aku merasa bersyukur banget.  Awalnya agak bingung daftarnya,  tapi stelah search di google, aku baru paham.   Ulasan : 1. Jadi,  pastikan kuotanya gak limit banget.  4. Harus sabar,  kalau buku yang kamu incar sedang kosong dan banyak 'antrian'. Aku masih gak mudeng dengan mode itu. Aku harus kembali memasukkan passwordku. *Yang jadi pertanyaan,  apakah nanti ada pemberitahuan kalo ada stok bukunya?* 5. Meski off data atau gak ada kuota,  buku yg telah km pinjam mash bisa dibaca 6. Buku disinu terbitan beberapa penerbit yang kutahu : Grasindo,  Gramedia,  KPG,  Mizan, Puspaswara,  Bentang,  aku belum ketemu terbitan gagasmedia atau penerbit haru.  semoga ada ya..üòÜüòÜ7. English: Many of my book wishlists are here. I feel very grateful. At first I was a bit confused about the list, but after searching on Google, I just understood. Reviews: 1. I don't know how much the book borrowing limit is (I've been to 4) 2. The payback period is 3 days. If it exceeds, the book will be returned automatically. I wish there was an *'extend'* mode to make it easier so you don't have to return books and then borrow again. 3. You have to be patient because when you roll down, this library always loads data. So, make sure the quota is not too limited. 4. You have to be patient, if the book you are looking for is empty and there are many 'queues'. I'm still not familiar with that mode. I have to re-enter my password. *The question is, will there be a notification when the book is in stock?* 5. Even if the data is off or there is no quota, the books that you have borrowed can still be read 6. The books here are published by several publishers that I know: Grasindo, Gramedia, KPG, Mizan , Puspaswara, Bentang, I haven't found a gagasmedia or Haru publisher yet. I hope there is..üòÜüòÜ7. When you want to borrow, make sure the quota is not problematic. . Looks like that first... this app is very helpful. Thank you. üòäüòäüòä happy readingüòÜüòÜüòÜ

content: Sangat bermanfaat! Jujur saya menantikan bisa membaca buku secara digital untuk mendapatkan gambaran mengenai isinya secara gratis. Baru setelah saya merasa sreg dengan isinya, saya akan beli versi hardcopy karena saya lebih menyukai membaca hardcopy. Aplikasi ini memungkinkan saya bisa meminjam buku bagus tanpa harus datang langsung ke tempatnya. Saya sangat menantikan koleksinya bisa menjadi semakin lengkap dengan penerbit yang juga oke punya seperti UI Press,UGM Press,IPB Press,Kompas Gramedia, Rosda, Grasindo, Elex Media, Bhuana Ilmu Populer, Qibla, dsb. Saya juga berharap ada majalah digital keluaran Kompas Gramedia maupun jurnal-jurnal ilmiah seperti dari LIPI, UI, UGM, dsb dalam bentuk digital. Maju terus Perpustakaan RI!
English: Very helpful! I was honestly looking forward to being able to read the book digitally to get an overview of its contents for free. Only after I feel comfortable with the contents, I will buy the hardcopy version because I prefer reading hardcopy. This application allows me to borrow good books without having to come directly to the place. I really look forward to the collection being more complete with publishers who are also okay to have such as UI Press, UGM Press, IPB Press, Kompas Gramedia, Rosda, Grasindo, Elex Media, Bhuana Popular Science, Qibla, etc. I also hope that there will be digital magazines issued by Kompas Gramedia as well as scientific journals such as those from LIPI, UI, UGM, etc. in digital form. Keep going RI Library!

content: Sebagai user setia ipusnas saya tidak bosan memberikan saran untuk pengembangan aplikasi ini dari kacamata saya sebagai pengguna. Saya sangat hobi membaca buku di ipusnas mengingat jumlah buku yang tersedia dan dapat dibaca sangat banyak. Namun ada kendala yang saya alami yang mungkin juga dialami oleh pengguna ipusnas yang lain. Kendala tersebut adalah besarnya memori yang harus disediakan apabila ada beberapa buku yang ukuran filenya besar. Atau ingin meminjam 3 buku sekaligus yang selanjutnya diakumulasi menyebabkan memori yang dibutuhkan juga relatif besar untuk diunduh. Nah masukan yang ingin saya sampaikan adalah sekiranya pihak developer PT. Woolu Aksaramaya dapat mendevelop ipusnas ini agar dapat disetting aplikasinya untuk bisa dipindahkan ke memori ekternal handphone agar nantinya tidak memberatkan memory internal handphone. Semoga aspirasi kecil saya ini bisa dikabulkan. Fully respect from your little user. Berjayalah aplikasi made in Indonesiaüí™üí™üí™
English: As a loyal Ipusnas user, I don't get tired of giving suggestions for the development of this application from my point of view as a user. I really like reading books at Ipusnas considering the number of books available and can be read very much. However, there are obstacles that I experienced that may also be experienced by other Ipusnas users. The obstacle is the amount of memory that must be provided if there are several books with large file sizes. Or want to borrow 3 books at once which is then accumulated causing the required memory is also relatively large to download. So the input I want to convey is that if the developer PT. Woolu Aksaramaya can develop this ipusnas so that the application can be set so that it can be moved to the external memory of the cellphone so that later it doesn't burden the phone's internal memory. I hope this little wish of mine can be granted. Fully respect from your little user. Good luck made in Indonesia applicationüí™üí™üí™
